name: Downward Spiral: Horus Station
description: Downward Spiral: Horus Station is a mysterious and atmospheric zero gravity thriller set in the lost and forgotten Horus Station.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290, equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: 64 Bit
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: 64 Bit
